original: intros. intros Hb Hv Har. destruct Har as [Har1 Har2]. destruct Har1 as [Har1 | Har1]. - left. unfold rem. rewrite Har1. rewrite Har2. rewrite <- Hv. reflexivity. - right. unfold rem. rewrite Har1. rewrite Har2. reflexivity.
